name: Giraff
description: This is my Grade 7 Independent Study Unit project. Art, coding, and design all done by me. I only had less than a month to work on it, but might add more later. Currently 8 levels, a boss, and secret level. First file is the zip the other two are the include files, I also just added HTML because some people don't like downloading. The game UI may be cropped depending on the size of your device. I've only used Godot for 2 months so I wasn't sure how to fix this.
